name: Magnetic Flux (TriJam#196)
description:
Topic: Interference does damage

Magnetic Flux (TriJam#196)

Interference does damage - Watch out for the black holes!

If you get too close to the lightning, it interferes with your system and your spaceship goes out of control. Whereas you already can't slow down your spaceship any more!

Manoeuvre left and right to avoid the obstacles.
But be careful! You may find useful items on your journey.

Made in 3 hours for TriJam#196 in a Team of three:
Coding: Grisgram
Visuals: elKorte
Audio: Baeblsh
